usage_note: Components below are from the Metafore primitives catalog (Untitled UI). Since generated code runs in a browser sandbox (React CDN + Tailwind CDN), recreate these patterns using Tailwind classes. Do NOT use import statements.

components.name: Button
components.description: Primary action button. Supports size variants (sm/md/lg/xl), color variants (primary, secondary, tertiary, link-gray, link-color, primary-destructive, secondary-destructive, tertiary-destructive, link-destructive), loading state, leading/trailing icons, and can render as link.
components.tailwind_pattern: <button className="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-1 rounded-lg px-3.5 py-2.5 text-sm font-semibold bg-purple-600 text-white shadow-sm hover:bg-purple-700 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:ring-offset-2 disabled:opacity-50 disabled:cursor-not-allowed transition-colors">Label</button>

variants.secondary: bg-white text-gray-700 border border-gray-300 shadow-sm hover:bg-gray-50
variants.link-gray: bg-transparent text-gray-600 hover:text-gray-700 underline-offset-2 hover:underline p-0
variants.link-color: bg-transparent text-purple-600 hover:text-purple-700 underline-offset-2 hover:underline p-0
variants.secondary-destructive: bg-white text-red-600 border border-red-300 shadow-sm hover:bg-red-50
variants.link-destructive: bg-transparent text-red-600 hover:text-red-700 underline-offset-2 hover:underline p-0

sizes.sm: gap-1 rounded-lg px-3 py-2 text-sm font-semibold
sizes.md: gap-1 rounded-lg px-3.5 py-2.5 text-sm font-semibold
sizes.lg: gap-1.5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2.5 text-base font-semibold
sizes.xl: gap-1.5 rounded-lg px-5 py-3 text-base font-semibold

components.loading_pattern: <button className="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-lg px-3.5 py-2.5 text-sm font-semibold bg-purple-700 text-white shadow-sm cursor-not-allowed"><svg className="animate-spin w-5 h-5" viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none"><circle className="opacity-30" cx="10" cy="10" r="8" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" /><circle className="origin-center animate-spin" cx="10" cy="10" r="8" stroke="currentColor" strokeWidth="2" strokeDasharray="12.5 50" strokeLinecap="round" /></svg>Loading...</button>

components.name: ButtonUtility
components.description: Small icon-only utility button (e.g. copy, settings gear). Supports secondary/tertiary color and xs/sm sizes. Often paired with a tooltip.
components.tailwind_pattern: <button className="inline-flex items-center justify-center rounded-md p-1.5 bg-white text-gray-500 shadow-sm border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-600 focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:ring-offset-2 transition-colors"><svg className="w-5 h-5" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M8 16H6a2 2 0 01-2-2V6a2 2 0 012-2h8a2 2 0 012 2v2m-6 12h8a2 2 0 002-2v-8a2 2 0 00-2-2h-8a2 2 0 00-2 2v8a2 2 0 002 2z" /></svg></button>

variants.secondary: bg-white text-gray-500 shadow-sm border border-gray-200 hover:bg-gray-50 hover:text-gray-600

components.name: ButtonGroup
components.description: Segmented toggle button group for single-selection between options. Items share a connected visual border. Supports icon-leading items.

components.name: CloseButton
components.description: Close/dismiss button with X icon. Used in modals, notifications, drawers. Supports light/dark themes and xs/sm/md/lg sizes.
components.tailwind_pattern: <button className="flex items-center justify-center w-9 h-9 rounded-lg p-2 text-gray-500 hover:bg-gray-100 hover:text-gray-600 transition-colors focus:outline-none focus:ring-2 focus:ring-purple-500 focus:ring-offset-2"><svg className="w-5 h-5" fill="none" stroke="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path strokeLinecap="round" strokeLinejoin="round" strokeWidth={2} d="M6 18L18 6M6 6l12 12" /></svg></button>

components.name: SocialButton
components.description: Social login button for Google, Facebook, Apple, Twitter, Figma, Dribbble. Supports brand-colored, gray, and icon-only modes.
components.tailwind_pattern: <button className="inline-flex items-center justify-center gap-3 rounded-lg px-4 py-2.5 text-base font-semibold bg-white text-gray-700 border border-gray-300 shadow-sm hover:bg-gray-50 transition-colors"><svg className="w-6 h-6" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><!-- social icon SVG --></svg>Sign in with Google</button>

variants.google_brand: bg-white text-gray-700 border border-gray-300 shadow-sm hover:bg-gray-50
variants.gray: bg-white text-gray-700 border border-gray-300 shadow-sm hover:bg-gray-50

components.name: Input
components.description: Text input field with label, placeholder, hint text, tooltip, validation error state, and leading icon. Built on React Aria TextField.
components.tailwind_pattern: This is a hint text to help user.
components.error_state:
border-red-300 focus:ring-red-500 focus:border-red-500 +

Error message

components.name: InputGroup
components.description: Input with visual addons — leading/trailing prefix text or buttons attached to the input. Used for URLs, currencies, phone numbers.
components.tailwind_pattern: https://

components.name: Label
components.description: Form field label with optional required indicator (*) and help tooltip icon.

components.name: Checkbox
components.description: Checkbox with optional label and hint text. Supports sm/md sizes, indeterminate state, and disabled state. Brand purple when checked.

components.name: Select
components.description: Dropdown select with label, hint, placeholder icon, avatar support, and supporting text. Compound component with Select.Item and Select.ComboBox sub-components.
components.tailwind_pattern: This is a hint text to help user.
components.dropdown_item: Olivia Rhye @olivia

components.name: MultiSelect
components.description: Multi-select with search input and tag-based selected items display. Selected items appear as small tag chips with avatar and close button inside the input.
components.tailwind_pattern: Olivia

components.name: Combobox
components.description: Searchable select dropdown. Shows a search icon, text input, optional keyboard shortcut badge, and filterable list. The selected item's label and supporting text are displayed.
components.tailwind_pattern: ⌘K

components.name: Textarea
components.description: Multi-line text input with label, hint, tooltip, and validation. Resizable with custom drag handle styling.
components.tailwind_pattern: Write a short description.

components.name: Badge
components.description: Status badge/pill in multiple types: pill-color (rounded-full), badge-color (rounded-md), badge-modern (with shadow). Supports 12 colors, dot indicator, icon, flag, image, and close button sub-variants.
components.tailwind_pattern: Active

types.badge-modern: rounded-md ring-1 ring-inset shadow-sm bg-white text-gray-700 ring-gray-200

components.with_dot: Active
components.with_icon: Label
components.with_close_button: Label

components.name: Avatar
components.description: User avatar showing image, initials fallback, or placeholder icon. Supports 7 sizes (xxs–2xl), online/offline status indicator, verified tick, and badge overlay.
components.with_initials: OR

components.name: Toggle
components.description: On/off switch toggle with optional label and hint text. Supports sm/md sizes and a slim variant. Brand purple when active.

components.name: Tooltip
components.description: Hover tooltip with dark background, white text, rounded-lg. Supports title, description, arrow, and placement (top/bottom/left/right). Animated entrance/exit.
components.tailwind_pattern:
Hover me
Tooltip text
components.with_description: TitleDescription text here

components.name: Slider
components.description: Range slider with track, fill, and thumb. Supports single and dual thumbs, percentage display, and label positions (hidden, bottom, floating tooltip).

components.name: Dropdown
components.description: Action dropdown menu with trigger button (dots icon), popover container, menu items with icon/label/addon shortcut, sections, and separators. Compound component pattern.
props: children (compound: Root, Popover, Menu, Item, Separator, DotsButton)

components.name: Tags
components.description: Tag/chip component within a TagGroup. Supports selection (none/single/multiple), avatar, dot indicator, count badge, close button, and sm/md/lg sizes.
components.tailwind_pattern: Design
components.with_count: Feature12

components.name: Progress
components.description: Horizontal progress bar showing completion percentage. Brand purple fill on gray track.
components.tailwind_pattern: Progress 75%

components.name: FeaturedIcon
components.description: Icon container in styled backgrounds. Supports 6 themes (light, gradient, dark, outline, modern, modern-neue), 5 colors (brand/gray/error/warning/success), and 4 sizes (sm/md/lg/xl).

themes.modern: bg-white text-gray-700 rounded-lg shadow-sm border border-gray-200

components.name: DotIcon
components.description: Small colored dot SVG indicator. Used inside badges, tags, and status indicators. Renders as inline SVG circle.
components.alt_svg_pattern: <svg width="8" height="8" viewBox="0 0 8 8" fill="none"><circle cx="4" cy="4" r="2.5" fill="currentColor" stroke="currentColor" /></svg>

components.name: RatingBadge
components.description: Award-style rating display with decorative wreath SVGs flanking a centered rating stars + title + subtitle. Supports light/dark themes.
components.tailwind_pattern:
Best Design Tool

2,000+ reviews

components.name: RatingStars
components.description: Star rating display with partial-fill support. Each star can show 0–100% fill via SVG clipPath, allowing fractional ratings (e.g. 4.3 out of 5). Amber/yellow color.
components.partial_fill_note: For partial star fills, use SVG clipPath with a percentage-width rect to mask the filled star path.

components.name: Pagination
components.description: Page navigation with prev/next buttons, numbered page items, ellipsis, and mobile-responsive layout. Multiple layout variants: default (with link-gray buttons), minimal center, card default, card minimal, and button group.
components.tailwind_pattern: ...
components.mobile_pattern: Page 1 of 10

components.name: Tabs
components.description: Horizontal tab navigation with underline active indicator. Active tab shows brand purple bottom border. Supports multiple visual styles.

components.name: Table
components.description: Data table with compound component API: Table, Table.Header, Table.Head, Table.Body, Table.Row, Table.Cell. Supports sorting indicators, checkbox selection (single/multiple), row hover, and a TableCard wrapper with title/badge/description header. Sizes: sm and md.

sizes.sm: header h-9, rows h-14, head px-5, cells px-5 py-3
sizes.md: header h-11, rows h-[72px], head px-6, cells px-6 py-4

components.name: EmptyState
components.description: Empty state compound component with Header (background pattern + icon/illustration), Content (title + description), and Footer (action buttons). Sizes: sm, md, lg. Uses FeaturedIcon in 'modern' theme.
props: children (compound: Header, FeaturedIcon, Illustration, Content, Title, Description, Footer)

components.name: LoadingIndicator
components.description: Loading spinner with three visual types: line-simple (circle track + arc), line-spinner (single arc), dot-circle (dotted arc). Supports sm/md/lg/xl sizes and optional text label.
components.tailwind_pattern: Loading...

types.line-spinner: Single colored arc, no background track

components.name: HomeScreen
components.description: Starter kit home page with centered layout: logo, headline, subtitle, code snippet with copy button, and navigation links (Docs, Icons, Help) using link-color buttons.
components.tailwind_pattern:

layout_patterns.sidebar_layout: flex min-h-screen: sidebar w-64 bg-white border-r border-gray-200 + main flex-1

icon_patterns.note: Use inline SVG for icons. Common icons below (stroke-based, 24x24 viewBox). In Metafore, icons come from @untitledui/icons (1,100+ line icons). For sandbox use, recreate with inline SVG.

design_tokens_mapping.note: Metafore uses custom semantic CSS tokens (e.g. text-primary, bg-brand-solid). Map them to standard Tailwind below.
